pages.text: Players should venture into the Aether once they've invested in a trait that grants access to the dimension. Practitioners of SKILLZ and GRAYCE must eventually seek the resources of the Aether to continue their progression.
Level 6 Aether Biomes$(li)Aether$(li)Mystic Desert$(li)Mystic Forest$(li)Mystic Plains$(li)Mystic Swamps
